message.content:
Step 1: Identify the relevant line items:
 • For the systematic allocation of a depreciable asset's amount, use the "Depreciation" line item.
 • For the reduction in the amount of assets held for sale (or in production/manufacturing for sale), use the " (Increase) Decrease in Inventory" line item.
 • For the net amount of cash generated from the acquisition and disposal of long‑term assets and other investments (excluding cash equivalents), use the "Net Cash Flow from Investing Activities" line item.
 • For the net addition in the amount of cash and cash equivalents during the period, use the "Net Increase" line item.

Step 2: Extract the values from the statement for each:
 • Depreciation = 117540.62
 • (Increase) Decrease in Inventory = -7869940.00
 • Net Cash Flow from Investing Activities = -2496137.92
 • Net Increase = -7000890.60

Step 3: Present the answer in the required JSON format.

{
  "solution": {
    "value1": "117540.62",
    "value2": "-7869940.00",
    "value3": "-2496137.92",
    "value4": "-7000890.60"
  }
}
